summary: Defines a configuration component that prepares and translates OpenAI‑style chat completion requests for Fireworks AI, handling authentication retrieval, supported parameter enumeration, and conversion of request fields to the Fireworks AI schema.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless integration of Fireworks AI's chat model into an OpenAI‑compatible interface, allowing applications to invoke Fireworks AI using familiar parameters while abstracting authentication and request formatting.
